did.abstract: Collection comprises a letter of recommendation Marsh wrote (1845 October 16) to Rev. Bennett Tylor on behalf of Nelson Scott, who was seeking to continue his studies in the ministry.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Charles Marsh was a member of the House of Representatives, serving Vermont, and founder of the American Colonization Society.
